explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses anomaly detection methods, which are a part of machine learning.
explanations.unsupervised learning: Anomaly detection is typically an unsupervised learning task as it involves identifying outliers without labeled data.
explanations.decision tree: The paper focuses on isolation forests, which are based on decision trees.
explanations.clustering: The paper mentions incorporating clustering-based learning to hash for better isolation quality.
explanations.deep learning: The paper compares the proposed method with state-of-the-art deep learning based methods.
